name: @saekitominaga/customelements-input-switch
description: Implement something like <input type=switch> by Custom Elements.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputSwitch.js -- brotlin compress dist/InputSwitch.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputSwitch.js -- terser dist/InputSwitch.js -o dist/InputSwitch.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/InputSwitch.js.map',filename='InputSwitch.js',includeSources,url='InputSwitch.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputSwitch.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/InputSwitch.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/InputSwitch.d.ts -- cpy dist/InputSwitch.d.ts dist --rename=InputSwitch.min.d.ts
